question: What Happens If Max Advises Kate To Go To The Police?

choices.A: Kate Will Be Appreciative And Send Max SMS Messages Later To Thank Her For Her Advice
choices.B: Kate Will Be Upset And Refuse To Talk Any Further
choices.C: Kate Will Acknowledge Max's Help But Will Not Change Her Decision
choices.D: Kate Will Jump Off The Roof

question: What Happens If Max Tells Kate She Is Gathering Proof?

choices.A: Kate Will Be Upset And Take A Few Steps Closer To The Edge Of The Roof
choices.B: Kate Will Acknowledge Max's Help And Enable Max To Get Closer To Save Her
choices.C: Kate Will Refuse To Talk Any Further
choices.D: Kate Will Jump Off The Roof

question: What Happens If Max Chooses Belgian Waffles For Breakfast At Two Whales Diner?

choices.A: The Nightmare-Max Sitting At The Same Place As Max In Episode 5 Will Also Be Eating Belgian Waffles
choices.B: The Nightmare-Max Sitting At The Same Place As Max In Episode 5 Will Also Be Eating Bacon Omelette
choices.C: Max Will Not Be Able To Finish Her Breakfast

question: What Happens If Max Ignores Kate's Video Link In The Shower Room?

choices.A: Max Will Not Mention The Link During The Conversation With Kate On The Rooftop
